sentences: Loodusrahvad kasutavad kalamürki, mis hävitab nende eesmärkidel.
Kui mürk hävitab, siis see on ohtlik.
context: The word 'hävitab' is the 3rd person singular present tense form of the Estonian verb 'hävitama', which means to destroy, eliminate, or kill something. It describes an action that completely removes or destroys something - in this case specifically referring to destroying fish as mentioned in the dictionary definition about poisons that kill fish in water bodies.
